title: Sehnsuchtskueche
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, European, German
description: Sehnsuchtsküche vegetarian restaurant has been operating since mid-2000s. Specializes in Swabian cuisine. Buffet service. First Friday of the month is reserved for private gathering, but is open for visitors to meet other vegans and people that are into the healthy lifestyle. Call for a reservation if attending.
